name: Yes No Unknown
title: Yes No Unknown
description:
A set of codes used to express an affirmative response (Yes), negative response (No), or indicate that an applicable response is not known (Unknown) with regard to the question posed. 

**Inter-jurisdictional Exchange (IJE) concept mapping**

|VRDR IG Code | VRDR IG Display Name | IJE Code |IJE Display Name
| -------- | -------- | -------- | --------|
|N|No|Y|Yes|
|Y|Yes|N|No|
|UNK|unknown|U|Unknown|
